name: Charlie Robbins
bio: Veteran of the enterprise software world, Charlie previously worked for Microsoft and consulted at several large financial institutions. After discovering Javascript and node.js, he left Wall Street to co-found Nodejitsu in 2010. He spends his free time making hot sauce, coding, contributing, and evangelizing open-source software in New York City. He holds a Bachelor of Engineering from McGill University and is a Masters Candidate at Columbia University.
